DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to analyze the clinical effects and adverse reactions of tripterygium glycosides (TW) and CTX in LN-V patients with gross proteinuria.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Study of TW in the Treatment of LN Type V With Gross Proteinuria
DOC.detailed_description: Compared with cyclophosphamide(CTX), to analyze the clinical effects and adverse reactions of tripterygium glycosides (TW) in LN-V patients with gross proteinuria.
